briefTitle: Outpatient Administration of High Dose Methotrexate (HD MTX) in Patients With Osteosarcoma

outcomeMeasures.title: The Number of Outpatient High Dose Methotrexate Courses Which Result in an Inpatient Hospital Admission.
outcomeMeasures.description: Patients will be evaluated prior to and daily during each outpatient HDMTX course, and if one or more of a list of hospitalization criteria are met, the patient will be admitted to hospital to complete that course.
